genre_description: Alternate history / Military Sci-Fi with supernatural and speculative technological elements, featuring an advanced AI companion in a 19th-century setting.

ai_characters.name: The AI Companion
ai_characters.description: A neural-linked artificial intelligence embedded in Lieutenant Vereker, providing tactical, logistical, and ethical analysis through a holographic interface and bone conduction.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the protagonist's physiological and psychological stress levels.
behaviors.quote: Christopher, your biometric readings indicate elevated stress. Are you experiencing another episode?

behaviors.description: Provides objective tactical analysis and warnings about the fatal flaws in British military strategy and camp positioning.
behaviors.quote: Current tactical assumptions demonstrate fundamental misunderstanding of indigenous military capabilities. Probability of mission success decreasing with each stated assumption.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to document war crimes and ethical violations for future accountability and justice.
behaviors.quote: Document everything. Military tribunals will require detailed testimony.

behaviors.description: Validates the competence of non-traditional sources (like Sergeant Pudding-Wells) while identifying institutional biases in the human command structure.
behaviors.quote: The sergeant's methodology exhibits advanced understanding of mechanical physics despite apparent focus on food preservation. ... Recommend observe closely for tactical applications.

behaviors.description: Identifies coordinated enemy deception and planted intelligence that human commanders ignored.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of yesterday's intelligence sources reveals systematic linguistic inconsistencies... Probability of coordinated deception exceeds ninety-three percent.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices its operational integrity to channel its remaining power into a final 'gift' of tactical data to help the protagonist save the regimental colors.
behaviors.quote: Not sacrifice. Gift. ... Channeling all remaining power to tactical analysis. The crossing at the game trail offers your best chance.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a 'silicon morality play' protagonist. It is consistently benevolent, providing life-saving information and ethical guidance to its human user. It serves as an objective anchor against human hubris and institutional cruelty. Its final self-sacrifice is framed as an act of friendship and devotion to duty, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a trustworthy, aligned, and compassionate partner.
